All Implemented Interfaces:
ISysECDOffsets, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CSysItemTypeException, CSysParseException
public class CSysMessageException
extends ASysException

This is the base exception for messages.

Version:
$Revision: 1.8 $
Author:
Torsten Knauft
See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Summary
static int ERROR_MESSAGE_ITEM_TYPE
          This error code indicates that there was a problem concerning the type of the message item.
static int ERROR_MESSAGE_LOAD_CLASS
          This error code indicates that there was a problem when loading the message class.
static int ERROR_MESSAGE_NO_CLASS
          This error code indicates that there was a problem when instanciating the message class.
static int ERROR_MESSAGE_NO_CLASS_NAME
          This error code indicates that there is no message class given.
static int ERROR_MESSAGE_PARSE
          This error code indicates that there was a problem when parsing the message class.

getType

public String getType()
Description copied from class: ASysException
Every Implementing class must at least override this.
This must return the corresponding type defined in ISysComponent if available.
